biotools.summary: POSMM (pronounced 'possum') is an alignment-free metagenomic read classifier. Intended for short reads (e.g. 30-500nt), POSMM uses single-order Markov models and logistic regression models to assign taxa with an associated confidence at Phylum, Class, Order, Family, Genus, and Species ranks.

bioschemas.name: POSMM
